text: Teen Wolf is a 1985 American comedy film. Teen Wolf may also refer to: * Teen Wolf Too is a 1987 sequel to the original film. == Television == * Teen Wolf (1986 TV series), an animated television series based on the 1985 film * Teen Wolf (2011 TV series), a live-action/supernatural drama television series loosely based on the 1985 film Teen Wolf: ** Teen Wolf (season 1) ** Teen Wolf (season 2) ** Teen Wolf (season 3) ** Teen Wolf (season 4) ** Teen Wolf (season 5) ** Teen Wolf (season 6)
title: Teen Wolf (disambiguation)
